id: Notion Household Tasks and Chore Tracker
name: Notion Household Tasks and Chore Tracker
description: The Notion chore and cleaning tracker template helps you keep your home clean and organized. The template is easy to use and can be customized to fit your specific needs. Features:Create tasks for each roomDistribute chores among residentsRecurring due datesRemindersDirtiness virtual indicator to keep you motivatedPrioritize tasks by due dateCustom frequency daysTrack cleaning suppliesTemplate walkthrough instructionsFAQDoes this work on the free version of Notion?Yes. you can use this template
features: Create tasks for each room; Distribute chores among residents; Recurring due dates; Dirtiness virtual indicator to keep you motivated; Prioritize tasks by due date; Custom frequency days; Track cleaning supplies; Template walkthrough instructions
